message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think it's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1300000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm not sure I'm willing to pay that much. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $900000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1150000. It's still a great price for a product of this caliber, and I think it's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $950000. I think this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to think you're really interested in this product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to meet my minimum threshold. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1050000. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else.

I understand that you're trying to meet your minimum threshold, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $980000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.

I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I'll sell the product to you for $1050000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're still not interested, I'll have to consider other buyers.
